瑉字的基本解释

瑉
mín
古同“珉”。

瑉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mín］
［《集韻》眉貧切，平真，明。］
同“珉1”。
似玉的美石。

瑉字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑉； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页737第02
【集韻】眉貧切。與珉同。石之美者。【周禮·夏官·弁師】諸侯之繅斿九就，瑉玉三采。【史記·司馬相如傳】琳瑉琨珸。　又【五音集韻】府巾切，音彬。石次玉者。史記琳瑉琨珸。劉伯莊讀。

瑉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
瑉字的起名意思

暂无。

瑉
Basic explanation of words
瑉
mín
Gu Tong "Min".
瑉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mín］
["Jiyun" brows are poor and cut, plain and clear. ]
Same as "Min1".
Beautiful stone like jade.
瑉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑉; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 737 No. 02
[Ji Yun] Poor and cut eyebrows. Same as Min. The beauty of stone. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Bianshi】The reeling of the princes and nine princes, the three picking of jade. 【Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography】Lin Yunkun.　[Five Yin Ji Yun] Fu towel cut, Yin Bin. Shi Ciyu who. Shi Ji Lin Yunkunmin. Liu Bozhuang reads.
